check.text.lockedMembersWarning: :warning: There are {COUNT} members don't have permissions to see the target message.
check.text.irrelevantMembersWarning: :warning: There are {COUNT} members without mentioned reacted to the target message.
check.text.leavedMembersWarning: :warning: There are {COUNT} users reacted to the target message and leaved the guild.
error.text.UNKNOWN_ERROR: :fire: We have a little problem. Please wait a few minutes before you try again.
error.help.UNKNOWN_ERROR: If you are still received the same responses, please join [Support Server](https://discord.gg/Ctwz4BB) to report the issue.
error.help.INVALID_MESSAGE_FORMAT:
Supported format:
1. Copy message link
2. Copy Message ID
error.help.UNKNOWN_MESSAGE:
Attention Please can not find the message of `{USER_INPUT}`.

1. Check the message format.
2. Check the bot permissions.
3. Check the target message is belong to current server.
error.text.NO_MENTIONED_MEMBER: :x: This message has no mentioned members.
error.help.NO_MENTIONED_MEMBER:
[Target Message]({MESSAGE_LINK}) has no mentioned members.
Target message must have at least one of below:
1. @everyone
2. @role
3. @member
error.help.INVALID_TIME_FORMAT:
Format: `YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm`
Example: `{TIME}`
User Input: `{USER_INPUT}`

Time Format:
1. Year `2023`
2. Month `01` ~ `12`
3. Day `01` ~ `31`
4. Time `00:00` ~ `23:59`
error.text.INVALID_CHECK_TIME: :x: the check time must be in the future.
error.text.CHECK_JOB_LIMIT: :warning: You have too much check jobs.
error.help.CHECK_JOB_LIMIT:
Please wait until some check jobs finished or use `/cancel` to cancel jobs.

{CHECK_JOBS}
error.text.INVALID_OFFSET: :x: The value **offset** should be in -12 ~ 12. Example: Asia/Taipei UTC+08:00 is "8".
error.text.INVALID_RAFFLE_COUNT: :x: Raffle count should be at least 1.
error.text.INVALID_RAFFLE_TIME: :x: The raffle time must be in the future.
error.text.RAFFLE_JOB_LIMIT: :warning: You have too much raffle jobs.
error.help.RAFFLE_JOB_LIMIT:
Please wait until some raffle jobs finished or use `/cancel` to cancel jobs.

{RAFFLE_JOBS}
error.help.NO_RAFFLE_PARTICIPANT: The mentioned members are qualified to join the raffle. Add reactions to the target message to join the raffle.
